rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {M3704}

unitName: Clinical honours thesis 1: Applied research methods and skills
description: This unit provides students with the opportunity to encounter a challenging research environment through the interaction of philosophical paradigms and extension of theoretical knowledge and acquisitions of skills to facilitate the undertaking of a research project. The unit will build upon knowledge gained in core undergraduate research units. Students will be allocated a research supervisor to begin formulating research questions and methodology for subsequent study.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
